description:
What is the “Microsoft Excel Training: Learn Excel 2010” course about?

In this Excel training course, you will learn efficient and effective ways to work in Excel environment from Dr. Chris Albright from Indiana University (you should Google him!). This comprehensive Microsoft Excel training course covers all the topics from beginners to advanced level. Instead of focusing on the length of the course, we focus on how effective the course can be; we value your time. We will teach you everything you need to know, all the way up to passing the Microsoft Excel exam, in little more than 8 hours videos.  These videos are broken down into 125 topics. All of these topics also come with Read and Practice workbook where you will be able to apply what you learned.

When we created this course, we had five things in mind.

  1. This Excel training course needs to be fun!
  2. It has to show the power of Excel.
  3. It has to show the real world applications of Excel.
  4. It has to raise your curiosity as you go from beginners to advanced topics.
  5. It has to remind you about what you have already learned.

Since you will spend most of the time in this course within Excel, you will love your new Excel tab, “Excel Now!”. You will be able to read, practice and watch videos, all inside your own MS Excel under this tab. As you learn new topics, you will find yourself looking forward to seeing how the future topics work. And as you go forward, we will also remind you about what you have already learned. You will get plenty of opportunity to apply your new Excel skills and see the power of Excel along the way. Trust me, it will be fun!

What kind of materials are included?

Reading Workbooks, Practice workbooks, Videos, Tip Files and an add-in that will allow you to access any part of this course from within your Excel Application.

How long will the “Microsoft Excel Training: Learn Excel 2010”course take to complete?

The course is only 8 hours long, but give yourself about 15 hours to master Excel.

How is the course structured?

For windows with Excel 2007 or 2010, you will get a tab in Excel called Excel Now!. This tab will have 125 topics with reading, practice and videos material built in. See the screenshots. 

For Mac users, you will find all of the material here on Udemy page.

Why take this Microsoft Excel training course?

This course is created by experts with you in mind.

Many universities require our course for their students.

Our Excel training course will make you efficient and effective in Excel in less than 15 hours.

You will be a rock star of Excel at School and Work.

And above all, you want to!

Sign up for this Microsoft Excel Training course now and learn Excel 2010 from expert.
title: Microsoft Excel 2010 Training Course - Online/Offline Access
